servinfo.title: Sliding (Sun) Roof Motor Removal and Installation

s1.ptxt: Remove spot lamp assembly from head lining.
Disconnect coupler (3) and remove sliding roof motor (1) by removing 2 bolts (2).

servinfosub.title: Installation

ptxt.intxrefpoff: Sliding (Sun) Roof System Circuit and Motor Inspection

servinfosub.ptxt: For installation, reverse removal procedure, noting the following points.

item.ptxt: Connect coupler to sliding roof motor securely.
Initialize sliding roof position data referring to “How to reactivate the system to prevent being pinched by the sunroof” in Sunroof section of Owner’s manual.
